title: Connection time out
body: At random i keep getting a connection timeout error only while attempting to find a game. once i am in the actual game and playing i do not have another issue. i have attempted to disable iphelper with no change. I have port forwarded .net also i have run the repair on my client itself still not fixing issue as well as running as administrator. is anyone else running into this issue?

replies.body:
It seems the issue you are having is very specific.  It's not a connection issue in general (you are fine once in-game), but you aren't able to maintain a stable and consistent connection to PvP.net.  Unfortunately, there is no single smoking gun that will resolve this issue.  The best step to take is to complete all of solutions in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which will allow us to start eliminating as many of the root causes as possible.

Let me know if none of those steps seem to help!
